Issue.creator: vramaiitkgp
Issue.summary: PTE Prequisite Requirements Don't Match Instructions in README
Issue.description: ~dongming `node` and `npm` versions indicated in `PTE/README.md` seem to be incorrect (it says node v7 is not supported.) But `PTE/package.json` lists different version ranges, and we need to install tools with those versions to build and run PTE.
